messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Mandai family
messages.msgSnippet: Hey... what does this book means? J.M. ... From: Kitsuno To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, February 25, 2004 10:36 PM Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Hey... what does this book means?

J.M.
----- Original Message -----
From: Kitsuno
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, February 25, 2004 10:36 PM
Subject: [samuraihistory] Re: Mandai family


Assuming the Sengoku Jinmei Jiten he has is the same one I have, I
found mine in a bookstore in Kyoto.

--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Júlio Mandai <jtmandai@u...>
wrote:
> Where can i find this "sengoku jinmei jiten" ?
>
> J.M.

> From: Anthony J. Bryant

>

anyone here

it, something
> > like it was a warrior family in Japan 400 years ago.
> >
>

jinmei jiten."
>
>
> Tony

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Mandai family
messages.msgSnippet: Where can i find this sengoku jinmei jiten ? J.M. ... From: Anthony J. Bryant To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, February 25, 2004 8:47 PM
messages.messageBody:
Where can i find this "sengoku jinmei jiten" ?

J.M.
----- Original Message -----
From: Anthony J. Bryant
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, February 25, 2004 8:47 PM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Mandai family


Júlio Mandai wrote:

> Hello everybody... this is my first time posting here... Does anyone here
> knows something about Mandai family?? I know something about it, something
> like it was a warrior family in Japan 400 years ago.
>



Sorry, but the name "Mandai" does not appear in the "Sengoku jinmei jiten."


Tony

messages.messageBody:
Hello,

I have seen several messages about this sengoku jinmei jiten. Could somebody
give me some link where I could have a pretty good idea of its content and
how to purchase it?

Than you :)

Brand.

messages.subject: Mandai family
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everybody... this is my first time posting here... Does anyone here knows something about Mandai family??  I know something about it, something like it
messages.messageBody:
Hello everybody... this is my first time posting here...
Does anyone here knows something about Mandai family?? I know something about it, something like it was a warrior family in Japan 400 years ago.

Thanks...
